Question.Subject: Whats a good dating site for a woman in her 30s in London?
Question.Content: I am looking for a proffessional middle class guy on the same wave length as me .. Not match.com or mysinglefriend or guardian soulmates or eharmony OR plenty of fish Serious answers only please
Question.ChosenAnswer: OzAdz - it's my favourite - no need to sign up too!

Answer.Content: OzAdz - it's my favourite - no need to sign up too!
Blimey wat happened 2ur last guy then ?.Y dont u tell us all wat u look like then !,ie:-how tall r u,wat colour ur hair,wat weight u r,wat web sites u been on ?. Try some of these :-
Answer.Reference: http://www.Londonguys.co.uk http://www.londonsingles.co.uk http://www.datingmen.online http://www.onlinedating.com http://www.datingsearch.net http://www.singlemen.tv http://www.www.datingguys.org

Answer.Content: Try mydiscreteplace.com - You could find lot of guys from London.
